verses.verse: Bel<WH1078> bows<WH3766> down,<WH3766> Nebo<WH5015> stoops,<WH7164> their idols<WH6091> were on the beasts,<WH2416> and on the cattle:<WH929> your carriages<WH5385> were heavy<WH3514> laden;<WH6006> they are a burden<WH4853> to the weary<WH5889> beast.
They stoop,<WH7164> they bow<WH3766> down<WH3766> together;<WH3162> they could<WH3201> not deliver<WH4422> the burden,<WH4853> but themselves<WH5315> are gone<WH1980> into captivity.<WH7628>

Listen<WH8085> to me, O house<WH1004> of Jacob,<WH3290> and all<WH3605> the remnant<WH7611> of the house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> which are borne<WH6006> by me from the belly,<WH990> which are carried<WH5375> from the womb:<WH7356>

And even to your old<WH2209> age<WH2209> I am he; and even to hoar<WH7872> hairs will I carry<WH5445> you: I have made,<WH6213> and I will bear;<WH5375> even I will carry,<WH5445> and will deliver<WH4422> you.
To whom<WH4310> will you liken<WH1819> me, and make me equal,<WH7737> and compare<WH4911> me, that we may be like?<WH1819>

They lavish<WH2107> gold<WH2091> out of the bag,<WH3599> and weigh<WH8254> silver<WH3701> in the balance,<WH7070> and hire<WH7936> a goldsmith;<WH6884> and he makes<WH6213> it a god:<WH410> they fall<WH5456> down,<WH5456> yes,<WH637> they worship.<WH7812>

They bear<WH5375> him on the shoulder,<WH3802> they carry<WH5445> him, and set<WH3240> him in his place,<WH8478> and he stands;<WH5975> from his place<WH4725> shall he not remove:<WH4185> yes,<WH637> one shall cry<WH6817> to him, yet can he not answer,<WH6030> nor<WH3808> save<WH3467> him out of his trouble.<WH6869>
Remember<WH2142> this,<WH2063> and show yourselves men:<WH376> bring<WH7725> it again<WH7725> to mind,<WH3820> O you transgressors.<WH6586>
Remember<WH2142> the former<WH7223> things of old:<WH5769> for I am God,<WH410> and there is none<WH369> else;<WH5750> I am God,<WH430> and there is none<WH657> like<WH3644> me,

Declaring<WH5046> the end<WH319> from the beginning,<WH7225> and from ancient<WH6924> times the things that are not yet done,<WH6213> saying,<WH559> My counsel<WH6098> shall stand,<WH6965> and I will do<WH6213> all<WH3605> my pleasure:<WH2656>

Calling<WH7121> a ravenous<WH5861> bird<WH5861> from the east,<WH4217> the man<WH376> that executes my counsel<WH6098> from a far<WH4801> country:<WH776> yes,<WH637> I have spoken<WH1696> it, I will also<WH637> bring<WH935> it to pass; I have purposed<WH3335> it, I will also<WH637> do<WH6213> it.
Listen<WH8085> to me, you stouthearted,<WH47> <WH3820> that are far<WH7350> from righteousness:<WH6666>

I bring<WH7126> near<WH7126> my righteousness;<WH6666> it shall not be far<WH7368> off, and my salvation<WH8668> shall not tarry:<WH309> and I will place<WH5414> salvation<WH8668> in Zion<WH6726> for Israel<WH3478> my glory.<WH8597>
